en.oxforddictionaries.com ID: 10675174 Merriam Webster defines a sandwich like this: View this image › 
merriam-webster.com ID: 10675184 7. And, finally, Urban Dictionary defines a sandwich as such: View this image › 
urbandictionary.com Fascinating. You can draw your own conclusions from all this.
ID: 10675165 8. Now, I’m a simple man. I wake up each morning, I set my feet down, I put one foot in front of the other, I flick my ankles, and I still can’t heel-flip. ID: 10674698 9. But I need to know your opinion.
